players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was found dead so suddenly. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we can trust everyone in this game."
Diana: "I'm concerned about the sudden turn of events last night. Let's make sure we all stay vigilant and communicate openly to build trust in this game."
Bob: "Let's all try to stay calm and work together to figure out who the mafioso is. We can discuss our plans for tonight and make sure we're all on the same page."
